pyBlockSeis
Block Choice Seismic Analysis in Python

pyBlockSeis is a tool for processing seismic data using the continuous wavelet transform (CWT). The tool is adapted from the Matlab software Block Choice Seismic Analysis (BCseis, version 1.1) by Charles A. Langston and S. Mostafa Mousavi.

Download documentation: PDF Version
